taskbody.context: From Katalon Studio version 8.3.0 onwards, you can install Appium and Xcode command-line tools (Xcode CLT) via Katalon built-in tools. To do so:

step.cmd: Open Katalon Studio and go to

image.alt: Install dependencies via Katalon built-in tools

step.cmd: Katalon will automatically install the latest version of Xcode CLT, Appium, Homebrew, NodeJS, and other iOS dependencies.
